attributes.action: ban RnB and hip hop music from all open places and enclosed public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Normal people have suffered too long.  We've had enough of the endless morons who listen to RnB and Hip Hop.  The music facilitates the gang atmosphere we currently have in our streets.

People nowadays are that moronic to be influenced by music, unfortunately the most easily influenced people are those that listen to RnB and Hip Hop.

It's time to ban this juvenile form of music and the culture that goes with it.  Let's reclaim our streets by thinking outside the box, ban RnB and Hip Hop!
